TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StrongTypingException extends System.Data.DataException

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown by a strongly typed when the user accesses a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The StrongTypingException class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
